div.h2: UPrep Rochester is a Charter School for Young Men in Grades 7-12
UPrep Rochester has a 96% Graduation Rate
Preparing for college, career and life

div.class: fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_1 fusion-builder-column-1 fusion-one-full fusion-column-first fusion-column-last fusion-column-inner-bg-wrapper 1_1
fusion-alert alert error alert-danger fusion-alert-center fusion-alert-capitalize

div.span: Click here to read our COVID-19 Coronavirus Family and Staff letter.

div.class: fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_1 fusion-builder-column-2 fusion-one-full fusion-column-first fusion-column-last 1_1

strong.span: University Preparatory Charter School For Young Men

span.i: “A culture of learning, growing and succeeding each and every day.”

div.class: fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_2 fusion-builder-column-3 fusion-one-half fusion-column-first 1_2
fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_2 fusion-builder-column-4 fusion-one-half fusion-column-last 1_2

p.i: University Preparatory Charter School for Young Men enriches the lives of young men, providing an environment that promotes academic, athletic and/or college and career readiness.

div.p: UPREP boasts a graduation rate of more than 90% for four consecutive years. More than a third of the young men participate in the sports program, which is second to none.
Every UPREP student completes the college application process. Additionally, the academic program is enriched by the only Career and Technical Center in NYS Charter Schools.

a.class: fusion-button button-flat fusion-button-round button-medium button-default button-1

div.class: fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_1 fusion-builder-column-5 fusion-one-full fusion-column-first fusion-column-last 1_1
fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_3 fusion-builder-column-6 fusion-one-third fusion-column-first fusion-blend-mode 1_3
fusion-title title fusion-title-5 fusion-sep-none fusion-title-center fusion-title-size-three

div.p: At UPrep, we are changing the narrative for young men in the City of Rochester. Our school opened its doors in 2010 with 157 students.
Today, we’ve more than doubled that number and 96% of our students graduate on time with a Regents diploma …

a.class: fusion-button button-flat fusion-button-round button-medium button-custom button-2

div.class: fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_3 fusion-builder-column-7 fusion-one-third fusion-blend-mode 1_3
fusion-title title fusion-title-6 fusion-sep-none fusion-title-center fusion-title-size-three

div.p: Young men thrive at UPrep. Students receive personalized attention in small class sizes.
We empower our students to make choices about their own education and gain experiences and confidence that will prepare them for life after high school…

a.class: fusion-button button-flat fusion-button-round button-medium button-custom button-3

div.class: fusion-layout-column fusion_builder_column fusion_builder_column_1_3 fusion-builder-column-8 fusion-one-third fusion-column-last fusion-blend-mode 1_3
fusion-title title fusion-title-7 fusion-sep-none fusion-title-center fusion-title-size-three

div.p: UPrep students proudly participate in Section V athletics as the Griffins.

When our young men participate in our athletic program, they learn so much more than the fundamental skills of a sport. Our athletic program creates positive social, physical and educational development …

a.class: fusion-button button-flat fusion-button-round button-medium button-custom button-4
